movies.title: Sanju
movies.plot: Sanju explores some of the most crucial chapters from movie star Sanjay Duttâ€™s dramatic and controversial real life. It gives a lowdown on his tryst with drugs and his trials and tribulations in the Arms Acts case and the 1993 Mumbai blasts.

events.title: Sanjay Dutt is sentenced to 6 years in prison
Sanjay Dutt is released from prison
